body: I've fixed some minor issues with the shields (they weren't centered in the viewport and were missing drop shadows), as well as added an `IdenticonField` which lets users cycle through randomly generated identicons on the Recipe Form in order to choose one they like. This needs a handful of tests, but this PR is getting a little large, so I'm going to say this is **ready for feedback**! IdenticonField on the edit recipe page On hover, users can see a larger view of the icon for inspection.
